summary: Allows you to use the Ebony Mail enchantment on other items.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b][u]WARNING:[/u] This mod has a bug that makes the smoke effect always active so don't download this mod.
Sorry everybody, I don't know how to fix this issue, but if anyone knows what I've done wrong please PM me.

In the future, I may remove this mod from the Nexus because I am currently working on a much larger mod that adds a lot of things, including a spell that I think is a much better alternative to these rings.

Sorry again to anyone having problems with this mod, if I learn more about what I've done wrong I'll update this page.[/b]
[/size]
[u]DESCRIPTION[/u][size=4]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size]
This mod allows you to use the Ebony Mail enchantment on other items. It does this by adding two craftable rings to the game that can be disenchanted. These newly acquired enchantments can then be put onto any other chest piece in the game.

[center][b]----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/b]
Please post a commend and leave your thoughts on the mod, I'd love feedback.
If you think of any ideas for this mod or if you notice any issues, message me and I'll address it as soon as I can.
Please endorse the mod if you like it, I'd really appreciate it.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]

[size=3][b][u]Boethiah's Poison Ring[/u]
[list][*]This ring has the exact same enchantment as the Ebony Mail does (black smoke effect, muffled movement, poison damage to nearby enemies).
[/*]
[*]It can be crafted with 3 ebony ingots in the jewelry section of the forge once you acquire the Ebony Smithing Perk.
[/*]
[/list][/b][/size][u][size=3][b]Boethiah's Shadow Ring[/b][/size][/u]
[list][*]This ring has the black smoke effect and the muffled movement effect but does not have the poison effect.
[/*]
[*]It can be crafted with 3 ebony ingots in the jewelry section of the forge once you acquire the Ebony Smithing perk.[/*]
[/list]
[b]NOTE: The in-game descriptions may be somewhat confusing and/or redundant but just remember, both rings produce the black smoke effect and make your movement muffled when you crouch (just like the Ebony Mail), but only the Poison Ring deals poison damage to nearby enemies.


[/b][size=4][u]INSTALL[/u]-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[/size]Simply download the file and extract the .esp into your Skyrim/Data folder, or use Nexus Mod Manager

[size=4][u]COMPATIBILITY[/u]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[/size]This mod adds two new rings and one new enchantment to the game, it does not remove or change any existing data, therefore it should be compatible with everything. If you do come across another mod that seems to be incompatible with this one, please message me and I'll see what I can do about it.

Thanks to UnitD77 for requesting this mod.
